_sText: This is the last time im updating surf_combine. Have fun :) THIS MAP IS NOT MEANT TO BE PLAYED WITH LOW GRAVITY OR ANYTHING HIGHER THAN SV_AIRACCELERATE 10 Changes since surf_combine_extended2: -Added my name near spawn -Changed glass in spawn to combine glass -Added 4 level -Added Win room and fight arena -Fixed exploit where you could skip parts of the first level. -Fixed teleport triggers at bottom of map -Changed and fixed water and water textures (reports of death after teleporting form bottom of map) -Added env_cubemap to more appropirate surfaces. -Added Terrorist surf spiral (instead of CT and T sharing the same spiral in the first level) -And some more minor changes
